resources.title: thoughtbot Blog
resources.description: Our very own blog that covers all topics on design and development. It's where we first started talking about design sprints back in 2013.

resources.title: SPRINT
resources.description: Jake Knapp spent 10 years at Google and Google Ventures, where he created the Design Sprint process. This is the official guide to running a design sprint.

resources.title: Sprint Stories
resources.description: Sprint Stories is a blog of case studies covering design sprints from partners at Google Ventures. It's a great place to see the outcomes a design sprint can achieve.

resources.title: Gamestorming
resources.description: Gamestorming is a collection of exercises that are designed to help make decisions and solve problems. We often customise our sprints with some of these exercises.
